page.title: 08MODERN HOME LIFE
page.content: {HOMES TODAY Our homes today have changed since the time of William the Conqueror.In the modern home we find time and labour saving gadgets such as in the kitchen there are microwave ovens,toasters,gas and electric cookers,food mixers,soda streams,food processers,dish washers and washing machines.Modern things in the living room are music centres, radios,television with oracle and teletext,video players,computers,gas or eletric fires and telephones.To keep the modern home warm we have central heating through the house by burning oil,solid fuel or gas.The heat is kept in by the cavity walls and roofs being insulated.We also have draught excluders and double glazed windows.Some homes have solar panels for heating water. .
